sources.title: Beyond the Trek | FULL MOVIE | Sci-Fi Horror
sources.description:
A deep-space mining vessel has been adrift for two years, and it's suspected that the crew brutally killed each other. A rescue team will soon discover the truth. Starring Sunny Mabrey ("Hillbilly Elegy").

#scifi #thriller #space #movie #mystery #crime #psychological #horrorstories

metadata.Plot: The crew of the ship Teleios, comprised of genetically modified humans, is sent to retrieve the cargo from a mining ship adrift in deep space. It is suspected the crew brutally killed each other, but the reasons unknown. However, when they investigate the crew of Teleios find there are two survivors, one member of the crew and an artificial life form unit. The memory of the AI unit appears to have been erased and Travis O'Neill refuses to talk. The genetically modified humans are breaking down and learn that the only way to reduce the symptoms is to drink the blood of an unmodified human. The crew discuss the possibility of drinking the blood of the man they believe maybe a serial killer, or may be completely innocent.
metadata.Actors: Sunny Mabrey, Lance Broadway, T.J. Hoban
